title: Handwritten script from logo
content:
Please help identify the handwritten script in this logo.

Font: 

 (handwritten, various alts) 

Solved By: 

 [defiantone](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/typophile.com/user/206966 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/typophile.com/files/image_80.jpg) | 7.55 KB |
author: Kmclell

comments.content: hm. all the repeaters are different. suppose it's possible someone made a font with all those alternates, but suspect it is truly handwritten. you might like [Bombshell](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/bombshell+pro/fonts/).
Thanks so much for your reply. Love bombshell, but was hoping for something more upright.

[Peoni Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/peoni-pro/) or [Jacques and Gilles](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/jacques-and-gilles/) by Emily Lime could suit you.

Brand identity by [Three Fifteen Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/threefifteendesign.com/brand-identity-katie-nesbitt-photography).  
Some more loosely in the same vein, may be a bit more upright: [Matchmaker](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fonted-house/matchmaker), [Anna Clara](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/anna-clara), [Janda Stylish](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimberly-geswein/janda-stylish-script), [Gemmadonati](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eurotypo/gemmadonati), [Despeinada](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/edy-type/despeinada)  
Find here a [previous discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803071332/http:/typophile.com/node/97535#comment-527745) that compiles many of the ones previously discussed.
